extendedInfo.description: Tabata training is a method of cardio interval workout. It was developed by Izumi Tabata at the National Institute of Fitness and Sports in Tokyo, Japan. Tabata Timer will help you to do Tabata traning.

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Good app, visually looks good easy to use. My only suggestion is different default whistles tones, eg shorts blast to start work and long to signal finish instead of the two default long ones. Galaxy S2
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Solid but for minor , gave me a good workout
reviews.comment: It gives a good workout on my SG3 but I noticed it would sound only once for my rest intervals. Changed settings,  now only once for work. Cannot use a long-play sound yet for notification.  Use only single play (e.g. \"beep\") and it works fine. Solid and free no adds. There is a volume setting on the app that must be put higher to hear well (default should change to 100%)
reviews.author: Luke Clardy

reviews.title: Like it hate it like it
reviews.comment: You know its a love hate work out, this ap makes it easier so you can DO MORE!  Easy to use.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Perfect, no ads and easy to use. The only thing that would be great is to be able to set the amount of times the cycle runs (like 4 sets of 8)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Almost Perfect
reviews.comment: Works great, love being able to set custom times.  Only needs to be able to run in the background in case you need to leave the app screen, or even a pause as someone else mentioned. I use it for my cardio workouts.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Where is the sound?
reviews.comment: I like this app. Easy to use but... I can\'t hear a thing even with the volume at 100%. Not really worth it if I can\'t hear when the next set comes up. #Droid2
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t whistle while you work
reviews.comment: Great when it works: saves my settings, loudly whistles when I need to rest or start up again. Simple and great - except that frequently,  it randomly decides not to blow the whistle or give me the option to change media volume. Could be a problem with my Lg optimus V, but I haven\'t had this trouble in other apps.
reviews.author: Danica Stone

reviews.title: Needs a pause/resume button
reviews.comment: Got a text message in the middle of a workout and it paused. When I closed the text, there was no way to resume so it made me reset and start over. Like the simplicity, though,.and easy to use.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice App
reviews.comment: tabata training makes 4 min workout feel like 30!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Does exactly it is supposed to do
reviews.comment: This is a brilliant app: 1. It does what it is supposed to do. 2. And only it.
reviews.author: Pavel Burov

reviews.comment: Simple and very usable
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Simple and good.
reviews.author: ziv afgin

reviews.title: Fantastic!
reviews.comment: Why can\'t all workout timer apps be this simple and user-friendly?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Gear app
reviews.comment: Great tabata timer with more settings than I expected and no ads.
reviews.author: Mendon Dornbrook

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: Would be 5 stars if beginning & rest period music continued throughout timer. Other than that, great app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Easy timer but seriously flawed
reviews.comment: Overall a good timer...but if you receive any kind of text popup notification or email notification in the top bar it will stop the timer and you cannot resume...you have to start all over..
reviews.author: Brent Lam

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: It does what it sets out to do and does it well.
reviews.author: Dustin Olley

reviews.title: Minimalistic and useful
reviews.comment: This does exactly what\'s necessary for Tabata.  No more or less.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good but....
reviews.comment: Sound does not work!
reviews.author: Kevin Hughes

reviews.title: Useless app
reviews.comment: Uselesss do\'t download.......
reviews.author: dipesh deepu
